Package cams.camp

Class CampInfo

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.CampInfo
public class CampInfo extends Object
The CampInfo class represents information about a camp, including its name, location, description, total slots, committee slots, and visibility status.

Instances of this class encapsulate the editable details of a camp. These details can be retrieved and modified using getter and setter methods accessed through CampEditor.

Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • CampInfo

      public CampInfo(String campName, String location, String description, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, boolean isVisible) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new CampInfo object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      campName - the name of the camp
      location - the location of the camp
      description - the description of the camp
      totalSlots - the total available slots for the camp
      committeeSlots - the number of slots reserved for the committee
      isVisible - indicates whether the camp is visible
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
